subtests.name: reports 'idle' for an animation with an unresolved current time and no pending tasks
reports 'paused' for an animation with a pending pause task
reports 'paused' for an animation with a resolved current time and unresolved start time
reports 'running' for an animation with a resolved start time and current time
reports 'finished' when playback rate > 0 and current time = target effect end
reports 'running' when playback rate = 0 and current time = target effect end
reports 'running' when playback rate < 0 and current time = target effect end
reports 'running' when playback rate > 0 and current time = 0
reports 'running' when playback rate = 0 and current time = 0
reports 'finished' when playback rate < 0 and current time = 0
reports 'finished' when playback rate > 0 and current time = target effect end and there is a pending play task
reports 'running' when playback rate > 0 and current time < target effect end and there is a pending play task
reports the play state based on the pending playback rate
